summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 19367, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Government Way, in the City of Seattle from the east line of Lawton Park, an Addition to the City of Seattle., to Twenty-fifth Avenue West; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law", approved on the 26th day of October 1908; and authorizing the dismissal of the action in the Superior Court based upon said Ordinance and authorizing the payment of all taxable costs.
